signature: RTree<T, S> add(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S>)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding entries to the R-tree, with similar input patterns.

enhanced_by.method_name: delete(Entry<? extends T, ? extends S>, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the state of the R-tree by adding or removing entries.
The search method can be used to verify the presence of added entries, providing a way to assert the state of the R-tree after adding entries.
After adding entries, the depth of the R-tree can be calculated to verify that the tree structure remains balanced.
